name: Too Much Monkey Business
description:
In Indonesia long-tailed monkeys are employed in an attraction called the "Monkey Mask".

In fact, monkey masks have been an entertainment material since colonial times. Day and night, in the small alleys of residential areas, on the streets, with costumes, chains tied to the neck and monkey training skills have become a commodity of people's entertainment that continues to be forced to do entertaining scenes.

Although many criticisms have arisen from many parties, who think that this business is a form of torture and a place of exploitation of primates. The masters who peddled the monkey rejected the notion on the pretext that this profession became the foundation for the survival of his family.
